pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 1, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 1, 2018:

Montréal, Quebec

11 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Cuisine-Atout and deliver remarks to highlight Budget 2018’s Canada Workers Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Cuisine-Atout
1945 rue Mullins

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 10:15 a.m. via the entrance on rue Mullins and present themselves to room 25
  • Photo opportunity of kitchen visit
  • Open coverage of the media availability

1:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the women’s organization Petites-Mains.

Petites-Mains
7595 boulevard Saint-Laurent

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 1 p.m.
  • Photo opportunity only
